abstract: Jon S. Corzine, who led both Goldman Sachs and the state of New Jersey, was married to Sharon Elghanayan last week before the Thanksgiving holidays.
snippet: Jon S. Corzine, who led both Goldman Sachs and the state of New Jersey, was married to Sharon Elghanayan last week before the Thanksgiving holidays.
lead_paragraph: Jon S. Corzine, the only man to have led both Goldman Sachs and the state of New Jersey, was married to Sharon Elghanayan, his long-time partner, last week before the Thanksgiving holidays.

headline.main: A Year of New Beginnings for Corzine
